label: logicC:psychology_en
steps: [1] If the client reports chronic stress, then sleep disturbances occur.
[2] If sleep disturbances occur, then daytime fatigue develops.
[3] If daytime fatigue is present and job demands are high, then work performance declines.
[4] The client faces high job demands.
[6] For all individuals x, if x shows persistent cognitive distortions, then x benefits from CBT.
[7] Person a shows persistent cognitive distortions.
[8] For all individuals x, if x benefits from CBT, then x should receive either cognitive restructuring or behavioral activation.
[12] Person a benefits from CBT and should receive either cognitive restructuring or behavioral activation (from [6] and [7] and [8]).
